caption.p: Characterization of HCV and calpain/cathepsin protease inhibitors against SARS-CoV-2 M pro using a consortium of secondary assays a.

table-wrap-foot.p: aValue = means ± SE from three independent experiments.
cThe IC 50 of PSI ( 64) on SARS CoV-2 M pro was calculated by end point reading of 1 h digestion, instead of the initial velocity.
